get.description: Lists the payment methods available for a billing account. Along with the payment methods owned by the caller, these payment methods can be attached to a billing profile to make payments. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: billingAccountName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing account.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Gets a payment method available for a billing account. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: billingAccountName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing account.

parameters.name: paymentMethodName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a payment method.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Lists the subscription aliases for a billing account. The operation is supported for seat based billing subscriptions.
Gets a subscription by its alias ID.  The operation is supported for seat based billing subscriptions.

parameters.name: aliasName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription alias.

put.description: Creates or updates a billing subscription by its alias ID.  The operation is supported for seat based billing subscriptions.

parameters.name: aliasName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription alias.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: New or updated billing subscription alias.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Lists the subscriptions for a billing account. The operation is currently supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement, Microsoft Partner Agreement and Microsoft Online Services Program.

Gets a subscription by its ID. The operation is currently supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement, Microsoft Partner Agreement and Microsoft Online Services Program.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

patch.description: Updates the properties of a billing subscription.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update billing subscription operation.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

post.description: Merges the billing subscription provided in the request with a target billing subscription.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to merge the two billing subscriptions.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

post.description: Moves a subscription's charges to a new invoice section. This operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the move subscription operation.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

post.description: Splits a subscription into a new subscription with quantity less than current subscription quantity and not equal to 0.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to split the billing subscription.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

post.description: Validates if a subscription's charges can be moved to a new invoice section. This operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: billingSubscriptionName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the validate move eligibility operation.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists payment methods attached to a billing profile. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.
Gets a payment method linked with a billing profile. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: paymentMethodName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a payment method.

delete.description: Deletes a payment method link and removes the payment method from a billing profile. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: paymentMethodName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a payment method.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

get.description: Lists the payment methods owned by the caller.
Gets a payment method owned by the caller.

parameters.name: paymentMethodName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a payment method.

delete.description: Deletes a payment method owned by the caller.

parameters.name: paymentMethodName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a payment method.

currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

AutoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a subscription.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.
The resource-specific properties for this resource.

BillingSubscriptionAliasListResult.description: The response of a BillingSubscriptionAlias list operation.

value.description: The BillingSubscriptionAlias items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

billingSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the billing subscription with the subscription alias.

BillingSubscriptionListResult.description: The response of a BillingSubscription list operation.

value.description: The BillingSubscription items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

BillingSubscriptionMergeRequest.description: Request to merge two billing subscriptions

targetBillingSubscriptionName.description: The ID of the target billing subscription that will be merged with the source subscription provided in the request.

quantity.description: The quantity of the source billing subscription that will be merged with the target billing subscription.

BillingSubscriptionProperties.description: The billing properties of a subscription.

autoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a subscription.

beneficiaryTenantId.description: The provisioning tenant of the subscription.

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency of the subscription in the ISO8601 format. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

billingProfileId.description: The ID of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed. This field is only applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

billingPolicies.description: Dictionary of billing policies associated with the subscription.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The display name of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed. This field is only applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

billingProfileName.description: The name of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed. This field is only applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

consumptionCostCenter.description: The cost center applied to the subscription. This field is only available for consumption subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement Type billing accounts.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer for whom the subscription was created. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

customerDisplayName.description: The name of the customer for whom the subscription was created. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountId.description: The enrollment Account ID associated with the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountDisplayName.description: The enrollment Account name associated with the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountSubscriptionDetails.description: The billing properties that can be modified. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

invoiceSectionId.description: The ID of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: The display name of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

invoiceSectionName.description: The name of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

lastMonthCharges.description: The last month's charges. This field is only available for usage based subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

monthToDateCharges.description: The current month to date charges. This field is only available for usage based subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

nextBillingCycleDetails.description: Next billing cycle details of the subscription.

offerId.description: The offer ID for the subscription. This field is only available for the Microsoft Online Services Program billing accounts.

productCategory.description: The category of the product for which the subscription is purchased. Possible values include: AzureSupport, Hardware, ReservationOrder, SaaS, SavingsPlanOrder, Software, UsageBased, Other

productType.description: The type of the product for which the subscription is purchased

productTypeId.description: The ID of the product for which the subscription is purchased

purchaseDate.description: The purchase date of the subscription in UTC time.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the subscription

reseller.description: The reseller for which the subscription is created. The field is available for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

renewalTermDetails.description: The term details of the subscription at the next renewal.

skuDescription.description: The SKU description of the product for which the subscription is purchased. This field is only available for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the product for which the subscription is purchased. This field is only available for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

status.description: The status of the subscription. This field is not available for Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the usage-based subscription. This field is only available for usage-based subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

suspensionReasons.description: The suspension reason for the subscription. This field is not available for Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

termDuration.description: The duration for which you can use the subscription. Example P1Y and P1M

termStartDate.description: The start date of the term in UTC time.

termEndDate.description: The end date of the term in UTC time.

BillingSubscriptionSplitRequest.description: Request to split a billing subscription

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency of the target subscription in the ISO8601 format. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

quantity.description: The quantity of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into.

targetProductTypeId.description: The ID of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. This value is not same as the value returned in Get API call and can be retrieved from Catalog API to know the product id to split into.

targetSkuId.description: The ID of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. This value is not same as the value returned in Get API call and can be retrieved from Catalog API to know the sku id to split into.

termDuration.description: The term duration of the target in ISO8601 format product to which the subscription needs to be split into. Example: P1M, P1Y

BillingSubscriptionStatus.description: The status of the subscription. This field is not available for Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

details.description: The list of detach payment method eligibility errors.

DetachPaymentMethodEligibilityErrorCode.description: Error code of the detach payment method eligibility validation response.

DetachPaymentMethodEligibilityResult.description: Error response indicates that payment method cannot be detached from billing profile.

DetachPaymentMethodErrorDetails.description: Error details of the detach payment method eligibility validation.

code.description: Error code for the detach payment method eligibility validation.

message.description: Error message for the detach payment method eligibility validation.

EnrollmentAccountSubscriptionDetails.description: The billing properties that can be modified. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

subscriptionEnrollmentAccountStatus.description: The current enrollment account status of the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountStartDate.description: The enrollment Account and the subscription association start date. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

details.description: The sub details of the error.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

MoveBillingSubscriptionRequest.description: Request parameters to transfer billing subscription.

NextBillingCycleDetails.description: The next billing cycle details of the subscription.

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency of the subscription in the next billing cycle.

url.description: Public URL of image of the logo.

expiration.description: The expiration month and year of the payment method. This is only supported for payment methods with family CreditCard.

lastFourDigits.description: Last four digits of payment method.

displayName.description: The display name of the payment method.

logos.description: The list of logos for the payment method.

accountHolderName.description: The account holder name for the payment method. This is only supported for payment methods with family CreditCard.

expiration.description: The expiration month and year of the payment method. This is only supported for payment methods with family CreditCard.

lastFourDigits.description: Last four digits of payment method.

displayName.description: The display name of the payment method.

logos.description: The list of logos for the payment method.

PaymentMethodResource.description: The payment method resource model definition.

paymentMethodId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a payment method.

RenewalTermDetails.description: The term details of the subscription at renewal.

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency of the subscription.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the product

termDuration.description: The term duration of the subscription. Example P1M and P1Y

resellerId.description: The MPN ID of the reseller.

SubscriptionEnrollmentAccountStatus.description: The current enrollment account status of the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

SubscriptionTransferValidationErrorCode.description: Error code of the transfer validation response.
